[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@cordjs/client](./client.md) &gt; [PluginInterface](./client.plugininterface.md) &gt; [start](./client.plugininterface.start.md)

## PluginInterface.start() method

Run whenever [Client.start()](./client.client.start.md) is called.

**Signature:**

```typescript
start?(): void | Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

void \| Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

All plugin start functions are called at the same time whenever [Client.start()](./client.client.start.md) is caled.

This is where you would do stuff such as connecting to the gateway.
